english.segment1: Time has come. Time is now. To break away from. From the crowd. Rise up, be strong. Come along
english.segment2: Chorus. We will run, never stop. Till weve given all weve got. Through the fields through the fire. Till we hit the final wire. By His power we will make it
english.segment3: We will be there. We will be there. When you fall down. Think youre through. And sin has taken. The best of you. Fall into grace and rise a new
english.segment5: We will sing this melody. Till we stand in victory. We will love we will give. We will run and we will live
